fields.value: Labcode 2- HIV neutralization testing with Luciferase Reporter Gene Assay in TZM-BL Cells

dsDescriptionValue.value: This protocol describes a pseudovirus assay that measures neutralization of HIV, SIV and SHIV as a function of reductions in Tat-regulated Luc reporter gene expression after a single round of infection in TZM-bl cells.
